NAME: org.wildfly.clustering.cache.registry

DESCRIPTION: Provides a registry of member specific information backed by a given cache.

  URL:  https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly

DYNAMIC: true

PRIVATE: false

SUPPORTS RUNTIME ONLY: false
